about_the_game:
Submerge yourself into the rippling pools Ƹ̵̡Ӝ̵̨̄Ʒ

The pools have been calling from your dreams, and now it’s time to bathe within their tiled, chlorinated depths as you explore the liminal worlds they’ve bled into. This complex yearns to be seen but should not be trusted—she sees all and seeks to understand in the only way she knows how…

In this navigational hazard, you’ll explore surreal poolscapes, dive deep into the waters, and encounter opportunities along the way to relax and soak in the sights. The world is littered with interactive moments and cinematic vistas.

• Just don't stare too long...

... or the complex will start to stare back •

Mechanics ♞♝

  • Immersive & Reactive Liminal Environments

    The world features beautifully rendered liminal spaces to explore and lose yourself within. Many environments will react to your presence and offer you an truly unmatched experience.

  • Relaxation

    A blend of calming bespoke music and mechanical relaxation tools offer you the opportunity to forget yourself and soak in the vibes.

  • Interactivity, Puzzles & Parkour

    Throughout the complex you will encounter various objects you can pickup, throw & use to solve various types of puzzles to gain access to deeper and more exotic spaces.

• There is more to this experience...

... than meets just the eye •

Liminal Spaces -`ღ´-

As you venture through the complex, you will explore several distinct liminal spaces that will test your sanity and soothe your yearning to explore these in-between places. Each space will be draped in a poolcore aesthetic, presenting themselves in a way you’ve never seen but crave more of!

  • The Poolrooms

  • The Backrooms - Level 0

  • The Skypools

  • The Playrooms

  • & More...

• Beware of just how deep you go...

... there's a possibility you won't be able to get back •

The Complex Awaits

• You've always been here...

... this place lives between the cracks that separate your reality from your mind •

name: Poolcore: Submersion Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in poolcore-inspired vibes as you explore a vast complex of mind-bending liminal architecture straight out of your dreams. Navigate through a facility filled with obstacles and puzzles, venturing into depths that descend far below the rippling, chlorinated waters.
